price: 56. Realicen el salat, entreguen el azaque y obedezcan al Mensajero para que Al-lah se apiade de ustedes.
arabic: وَأَقِيمُواْ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتُواْ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَأَطِيعُواْ ٱلرَّسُولَ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تُرۡحَمُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: wa-aqīmū al-ṣalata waātū al-zakata wa-aṭīʿū al-rasūla laʿallakum tur'ḥamūna
